entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers at times heavy. Low 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers at times heavy beginning after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Local amount 5 mm. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries changing to a few flurries in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
